original_title: Indian Foreign Secretary arrives on a two-day official visit
original_body_lines: Indian Foreign Secretary Vinay Mohan Kwatra arrived at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) for a two-day official visit, an airport duty officer said.
The group arrived at the airport at around 8.55 p.m today on a flight (IFC-33) belonging to the Indian Air Force from New Delhi, India.
A group of high officials from the High Commission of India in Sri Lanka arrived at the Katunayake Airport to welcome the visiting group. (T.K.G. Kapila)
